channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Minnesota fraud whistleblower says 'lack of guardrails was pretty shocking'
item.description: Minnesota DHS whistleblower Faye Bernstein claims the department ignored her warnings amid investigation into the alleged $9 billion fraud scheme.

item.title: Minnesota launched a website to correct misinformation coming from the Department of Homeland Security

item.title: Trump’s FCC Is Right To Make Late-Night TV Follow ‘Equal Airtime’ Rules
item.description: When it gave them an excuse to grouse about a Republican on late-night, Democrats were all for the equal-time rule.

item.title: Federal judge rules ICE in Iowa illegally detained man, tried to 'cover its tracks'
item.description: Federal judge ruled ICE illegally detained Iowa man, accused agency of trying to "cover its tracks" after violating immigration detention procedures.

item.title: India, EU reach ‘mother of all’ trade agreements after nearly 20 years of talks
item.description: The accord will see free trade on almost all goods between the 27 members of the EU and India, affecting nearly 2 billion people.

item.title: Redistricting fight erupts as Maryland Democrats move to redraw lone GOP House seat
